findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not follow the Solidity naming conventions, which can affect readability and maintainability.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: The contract contains dead code, which can increase the size of the contract and the cost of deploying and interacting with it.

findings.title: L19 - Stable Compiler Version
findings.description: The contract uses an unstable compiler version, which can lead to vulnerabilities and undiscovered bugs.
